title: How can ego create problems? What is your experience? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ego a three lettered word, which can definitely kill an relationship without any cause. In every relationship, the most important thing which matters is the communication between the two people and when this lacks in the relationship, it kills the relationship and the love between the two people. The very experience which i had with the letter ego is the broken relationship which i had with a friend. The very friend of mine had this problem of ego, and due to this ego we grew apart to such an extent that it killed the bond which we used to share one.
